00031 FusionCHPGenericData::Reg FusionCHPGenericData::reg;

00034 static AffymetrixGuidType ObjectName = "FusionCHPGenericData";
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Convert to the CHP pointer.
00038  */
00039 FusionCHPGenericData * FusionCHPGenericData::FromBase(FusionCHPData *chip)
00040 {
00041         if (chip != NULL && chip->GetObjectName() == ObjectName)
00042                 return (FusionCHPGenericData *)chip;
00043         return NULL;
00044 }
00045 
00046 AffymetrixGuidType FusionCHPGenericData::GetObjectName()
00047 {
00048         return ObjectName;
00049 }

00052 {
00053 }

00055 FusionCHPGenericData::~FusionCHPGenericData()
00056 {
00057         Clear();
00058 }

00060 /*
00061  * Get the id of the file (only valid for Command Console "calvin" files)
00062  */
00063 AffymetrixGuidType FusionCHPGenericData::FileId()
00064 {
00065         return genericData.FileIdentifier();
00066 }
00067 
00068 /*
00069  * Returns the GenericData object associated with a Calvin file, NULL for GCOS files.
00070  */
00071 GenericData *FusionCHPGenericData::GetGenericData()
00072 {
00073         return &genericData;
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool FusionCHPGenericData::Read()
00077 {
00078         GenericFileReader reader;
00079         try
00080         {
00081                 reader.SetFilename(filename);
00082                 reader.Open(genericData);
00083                 return true;
00084         }
00085         catch(...)
00086         {
00087                 return false;
00088         }
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool FusionCHPGenericData::ReadHeader()
00092 {
00093         return Read();
00094 }
00095 
00096 void FusionCHPGenericData::Clear()
00097 {
00098         genericData.Clear();
00099 }
